replies.bodyText: As in add CountDownLatch as a member field to this class?
replies.author: shahzaibj

replies.bodyText: And, for real, you should really look at moving this whole thing to a Future, where you don't need to worry about constructing whichever version of a latch that you want, or if we later want to change our synchronization on this we don't have to change all the code that uses it.

replies.bodyText: But extending the java base classes isn't always safe.  We got in trouble doing this this involving HashMap once, and I'm leery of it forevermore.
